sentences.sentence: She was advised to have an abdominal X-ray.
sentences.translation: 她被建议拍个腹部X光片。

sentences.sentence: An instrument called a trocar makes a puncture in the abdominal wall.
sentences.translation: 一种叫作套管针的器械会在腹壁上扎一个小孔。

sentences.sentence: He died of an abdominal infection caused by a rupture of his stomach.
sentences.translation: 他死于由一次胃穿孔引发的腹部感染。
